words.source: H3212 (הָלַךְ, 'to go/walk'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'And there went', ESV 'Now a man … went', NASB 'Now a man … went' — all agree
H376 (אִישׁ, 'man'), HNcmsa (noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'a man'
H1004 (בַּיִת, 'house'), HR/Ncmsc (preposition-min/noun-common-masculine-singular-construct); KJV 'of the house of', ESV 'from the house of', NASB 'from the house of'
H3947 (לָקַח, 'to take'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'and took', ESV 'and took as his wife', NASB 'and married' — all convey marriage
H1323 (בַּת, 'daughter'), HNcfsc (noun-common-feminine-singular-construct); KJV 'a daughter of', ESV 'a Levite woman', NASB 'a daughter of' — KJV/NASB literal, ESV paraphrases
